content: > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase > subscribe here 2 ** this delicate bookmark is made with a beautiful lace flower stitch the flower stitch creates a unique look that reminded of a small crown you can make this bookmark with or without the tassels this pattern is a quick and fun project and will make a wonderful gift for all book lovers - skill level - easy - the pattern is written using english u s terminology - hook size needed 3 mm / d - the bookmark is crocheted with 100% cotton sport #2 weight yarn - total amount of yarn needed 20gr/52m/56yds - finished size 6 9×1 8 in 17 5×4 5 cm without tassels if you have any questions regarding the pattern feel free to contact me copyright © 2022 gootie agat rottman-cassel all rights reserved the pattern and photos in this design are property of gootie you can sell the finished product on a small scale if you write about this product online please give credit to the original pattern please note that there is only a certain amount of variations possible when one crochets and any similarities to other patterns are purely coincidental to the best of my knowledge this pattern is my original unique design return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final 2 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up
